message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. Let me know if this offer suits your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product,  $200 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm interested in making a deal, but I can only go up to $100 at this time. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $150. This is my final offer, as this is close to the cost price for me. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $150 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend.  I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's my absolute final offer.  Let me know if we can reach a deal at that price.

Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. Considering the value of the product, I'm willing to accept $135 for it. This is a fair compromise, taking into account both our positions. I hope this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still hoping to get the product for $125. This is the most I can afford to pay.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that.
